author: pat o'rourke
comment: I I used this app for a half marathon. I found it very useful. Itseems quite gentle but I said that is not a bad thing. It is true the GPS can be a bit hit and miss but after I I changed it to run in the background it was a lot better. I ran injury free and knocked 13 minutes off my predicted time. I would would highly recommended it. It's a pity that you lose the plans when you create a new plan.

author: Grant Huddleston
comment: Created a marathon plan based on my target time and my other run data. Unfortunately it doesn't sync my gps watch, i can't sync it to my calendar either (even though it states it can and I've tried and tried!) & when i wanted to share the plan with some running friends, the only option is via Facebook.  The designers need to re-think the whole set up of this app, as in principle, it could be so much better.

author: Billy WONG
comment: For the past few weeks, I've not been able to import my Garmin data. It has happened in the past but somehow got resolved usually within a week but this time it's taken more than that. I emailed to their customer service and they acknowledged it's a known issue and their developer are looking into it and it's still not fixed.

author: Jolene Botha
comment: It asks for a goal time, which for me is 5km in 22min30sec, but when I add that I can currently run a marathon, it automatically calculates a goal time of just under 14 minutes for a 5km! Tried various scenarios, but it only jumps between sub 14min and 31min, both highly inaccurate. Why can't it just use the goal time like other programs? I'm an IronMan athlete hoping to improve my 5km run time. Don't see how the two are related. Very disappointed.

author: Danilo Fusco
comment: Terrible GPS but good training plan. While on a run it tells me I've ran double the distance I actually ran. Checking the recorded route after and it shows me zig zagging all over the place and seemingly running over water. Get the location stuff sorted and you have a great app.

author: Kim Tupper
comment: Tells me it has my email address already in use however when i go to forgotten password it then says not in the database. So you either have my details or not. But at the moment i cannot use it thus the 1 star review. Sort this out and id happily give more.
title: Cant use this app!

author: Dave Murray
comment: Great app, but the training plans don't tend into account what you can already do. It asks you what your are currently able to run the distance your are training for in, but then doesn't take that into account when generating the plan. You therefore end up training for something as if you are starting from the beginning.  Fix this and I'd rate much higher

author: Robyn Weaver
comment: Did anyone else have issues with mileage calculations? When I track my route on a run and then save it, the course on the map is not accurate. I can't figure out how much that's interfering with my actual mileage. The tracking can't seem to go in a curved line. What gives?

author: Clarissa Docksey
comment: Brillant app. Done 13/43 runs so far training for a marathon and absolutely loving it. And if it's an unexpectedly busy day you can always adjust. Also adjusts your expected race time depending on your weekly result. Ive gone from 3:58:52 to 3:34:22 by April 1st.

author: John Lamberton
comment: Tried to create a plan with a time goal (no date).  Software ignores time goal and instead gives a "prediction" for a race which can be soon or a long time in advance (e.g. in years time)which is way different to the goal.  Would be great if it calculated the plan actually based on the goal which is how I'd expect it to work!

author: Adam Lowery
comment: Shuts down while running every time and you don't notice. Had to resort to using my work iPhone version or a different app. Rubbish

author: Kristen Stephenson
comment: Used it to train for a 10km race and it was great but have tried to start a new plan and regardless of the distance or time I put in its telling me to run 5km at a 3.57 pace. So now it's totally useless don't waste your time unless this is fixed

author: Amy Herbert
comment: Was great to begin with but it doesn't record my distance anymore. Keeps saying it won't log runs under 100yards even when I'm runnin 4 or 5 miles. Highly frustrating as now I wish to increase my mileage, I chat just use the app to work our where to run.

author: Katie Plummer
comment: Perfect for a first time marathon schedule. I didn't know how many runs to do or how long they should be. This produces an easy to follow plan that is tailored to your day to day schedule. Marathon in 2 weeks!

author: laetitia wouendji
comment: I've downloaded this app with not much experience of running and after a bit more than a month a disappointed of the lack on Strenght training or guided speed training (intervals or fartlek). forst ghe intergace is super basic and a bit dated. I was also expected to run at my half marathon target speed only 4 weeks in. obviously I'm not that fast yet. I've started doing my own thing on the shorter runs to improve speed and ended up downloading a different app. only good thing is that it estimates your finish time which gives a confidence boost.

author: Mark Dunham
comment: Poor execution. Tried putting in my half marathon target time of 1h45m and it keeps showing me plans for a 59:30 time (world record is 58:30)

author: liss tailor
comment: I love the app. BUT there seems to be a bug whenever I choose improve skills instead of prepare for race. The target times it then gives are ridiculous for me, e.g. 3min/mile

author: Louise Thorne
comment: I have heard people raving about this app. I created a training plan to run a half marathon in 6 months time in 2 hours. It created a plan for 2 hours 10 minutes. Not what I wanted and I can increase the pace of the runs as they are far too slow. App does not allow for you to improve your pace at all. Worst app ever.

author: Dan Mackness
comment: I found this app really helpful and loved how easy it was to use. If you could move runs you miss to the next day to get the running tips and write your ownx description of missed runs rather than just have a few to select from, that would make it 5 star

author: Peter Helis
comment: I'd love to give this app a better rating for all it promises in the description. Unfortunately it never gets further than the welcome back before it abruptly shuts down.

author: Albert Keyack
comment: Idiotic sign on. Requests too much info. I just want a run schedule. Just crap

author: Martin Slater
comment: Lost me at the date field. I have to press back 703 times to set my date of birth? No chance. Great shoes, change your date picker and I may be back.

author: Andy Colman
comment: Gets distance wrong every time. Seems only to work in horizontal and vertical directions

author: Bea Mitchell
comment: I wanted to shift by one day some of the training to fit in with my schedule but found the app totally inflexible. Not useful if you have a job/family/life as well as wanting to train.

author: El Chancho
comment: Good app: + great training plans + completely free but : - does not support any heart rate monitor - doesn't tell you that your GPS is off - crashes sometimes
Good training app. I had GPS issues too, but after setting GPS to 'device only', it works well. Dont use the 'high accuracy' mode for GPS

author: Laura Cubbin
comment: Brilliant running app I am using to train for half marathon. Plan built to suit your individual fitness level (which I needed when starting from zero!) and have never felt any of the runs have been too hard but have felt constantly challenged and seen a huge improvement already!

author: Brian Randolph
comment: Having issues with saved runs not showing on activity.  Also, need volume control for voice guidance to be able to listen over music.

author: Gavin Funnell
comment: The running plans are great. when the app works, also great. But when it doesnt, i.e. freezing, crashing, failing to remember you're already running, it is a total nightmare!!

author: Jennifer Bush
comment: The birth date must be entered to make a plan, but I was born 36 years ago. Meanokng I have to scroll through 432 months to get to my years birth month...then it wouldn't let me choose the day. Seriously couldn't get through step one.

author: Damien Chapman
comment: Developers - in line with the other requests can you tweak the app to be able to manually select or change the target time please... would make a good app great if you did...

author: Tim Hewson
comment: The training plans are fantastic but unfortunately the importing of activities and sync with runkeeper are both broken. It's so close to being awesome, but it's currently just a dead app.

author: Konda Maruthi prasad
comment: Plans are good.I ran 7 km,but it shows only 2 km. I think it's having GPS issues.

author: Syaful Mohamad
comment: If u have no clue how much do you have to run a week en route to your coming, 10k, hm or fm race... this is the app for you!
Can't sync with Garmin or Strava annoying to have to log runs manually. Inaccurate description in App information
Skewed my route and pace was WR 230 pace.. The training plan is good but fix this GPS issue

author: Amandeep Kalra
comment: The app can be further improved by incorporating specific workouts like speed workouts, interval training, hill training etc.Best part of the app is that schedule can be customised as per one's convenience which makes it very doable.

author: Wertygfd01
comment: Great way to have a plan set up for you to follow. You say how much or little u can run, when your event is and how far it your target and the app will do the rest. A full plan with when to run and how fast torun as well aswhat the overall strategy is i.e. preconditioning. A great app

author: Jilly McCarthy
comment: I set a target time for a 10k race and the app completely ignored it, setting a target which is 10 whole minutes slower. Not particularly useful as now I don't know what pace to run at on training runs. No option to edit goal, either.

author: Praveen Punia
comment: This app is really good for training plans. But it will be great if you can add inbuilt music. Apart from it sometimes it doesn't sync workout. Add some suggestions about diet plans and injury free run also about post and pre workout activities.
